option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
%% Deployment Diagram (Mermaid) flowchart TD subgraph AzureContainerApps["Azure Container Apps Environment"] subgraph Portals LandlordPortal["Landlord Portal (Web App)"] TenantPortal["Tenant Portal (Web App)"] ListingPortal["Listing Portal (Web App)"] SupportPortal["Support Portal (Web App)"] end subgraph BFFs LandlordBFF["Landlord BFF (Container App)"] TenantBFF["Tenant BFF (Container App)"] ListingBFF["Listing BFF (Container App)"] SupportBFF["Support BFF (Container App)"] end APIGateway["API Gateway (YARP, Container App)"] subgraph CoreServices UserManagement["User Management (Container App)"] Identity["Identity (Container App)"] Orchestrator["Workflow Orchestrator (Durable Functions)"] Organization["Organization Service (Container App)"] Property["Property Service (Container App)"] RentalObject["Rental Object Service (Container App)"] RentalContract["Rental Contract Service (Container App)"] Vacancies["Vacancies Service (Container App)"] TenantService["Tenant Service (Container App)"] ApplicationService["Application Service (Container App)"] OfferService["Offer Service (Container App)"] DocumentService["Document Management (Container App)"] end end AzureSQL["Azure SQL Database (per service)"] ServiceBus["Azure Service Bus"] BlobStorage["Azure Blob Storage"] AppInsights["Application Insights"] KeyVault["Azure Key Vault"] AzureADB2C["Azure AD B2C"]
LandlordPortal-->|HTTP|LandlordBFF TenantPortal-->|HTTP|TenantBFF ListingPortal-->|HTTP|ListingBFF SupportPortal-->|HTTP|SupportBFF LandlordBFF-->|HTTP|APIGateway TenantBFF-->|HTTP|APIGateway ListingBFF-->|HTTP|APIGateway SupportBFF-->|HTTP|APIGateway APIGateway-->|HTTP/gRPC|UserManagement APIGateway-->|HTTP/gRPC|Identity APIGateway-->|HTTP/gRPC|Orchestrator APIGateway-->|HTTP/gRPC|Organization APIGateway-->|HTTP/gRPC|Property APIGateway-->|HTTP/gRPC|RentalObject APIGateway-->|HTTP/gRPC|RentalContract APIGateway-->|HTTP/gRPC|Vacancies APIGateway-->|HTTP/gRPC|TenantService APIGateway-->|HTTP/gRPC|ApplicationService APIGateway-->|HTTP/gRPC|OfferService APIGateway-->|HTTP/gRPC|DocumentService UserManagement-->|DB|AzureSQL Identity-->|DB|AzureSQL Orchestrator-->|DB|AzureSQL Organization-->|DB|AzureSQL Property-->|DB|AzureSQL RentalObject-->|DB|AzureSQL RentalContract-->|DB|AzureSQL Vacancies-->|DB|AzureSQL TenantService-->|DB|AzureSQL ApplicationService-->|DB|AzureSQL OfferService-->|DB|AzureSQL DocumentService-->|DB|AzureSQL Orchestrator-->|Events|ServiceBus Property-->|Events|ServiceBus RentalObject-->|Events|ServiceBus RentalContract-->|Events|ServiceBus ApplicationService-->|Events|ServiceBus OfferService-->|Events|ServiceBus DocumentService-->|Blob|BlobStorage AllApps["All Apps"]-->|Logs|AppInsights AllApps-->|Secrets|KeyVault Identity-->|OAuth2|AzureADB2C classDef external fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px; class AzureSQL,ServiceBus,BlobStorage,AppInsights,KeyVault,AzureADB2C external;

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
%% Service Interaction Diagram (Mermaid) sequenceDiagram participant LandlordPortal participant LandlordBFF participant APIGateway participant Orchestrator participant Organization participant UserManagement participant Identity participant Property participant RentalObject participant RentalContract participant Vacancies participant ApplicationService participant OfferService participant DocumentService participant ServiceBus participant BlobStorage
LandlordPortal->>LandlordBFF: HTTP (REST) LandlordBFF->>APIGateway: HTTP (REST) APIGateway->>Organization: HTTP/gRPC APIGateway->>UserManagement: HTTP/gRPC APIGateway->>Identity: HTTP/gRPC APIGateway->>Orchestrator: HTTP/gRPC APIGateway->>Property: HTTP/gRPC APIGateway->>RentalObject: HTTP/gRPC APIGateway->>RentalContract: HTTP/gRPC APIGateway->>Vacancies: HTTP/gRPC APIGateway->>ApplicationService: HTTP/gRPC APIGateway->>OfferService: HTTP/gRPC APIGateway->>DocumentService: HTTP/gRPC Orchestrator->>Organization: HTTP/gRPC (orchestrated calls) Orchestrator->>UserManagement: HTTP/gRPC (orchestrated calls) Orchestrator->>Identity: HTTP/gRPC (orchestrated calls) Orchestrator->>Property: HTTP/gRPC (orchestrated calls) Orchestrator->>RentalObject: HTTP/gRPC (orchestrated calls) Orchestrator->>RentalContract: HTTP/gRPC (orchestrated calls) Orchestrator->>ApplicationService: HTTP/gRPC (orchestrated calls) Orchestrator->>OfferService: HTTP/gRPC (orchestrated calls) Property-->>ServiceBus: Event (PropertyChanged) RentalObject-->>ServiceBus: Event (RentalObjectChanged) RentalContract-->>ServiceBus: Event (ContractChanged) ApplicationService-->>ServiceBus: Event (ApplicationChanged) OfferService-->>ServiceBus: Event (OfferChanged) DocumentService-->>BlobStorage: Store/Retrieve Documents
